name: Try to create a Sales Lead Appointment with an invalid interestedInProduct Value

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000933079696000"
And I have authenticated the Customer to authentication level 1

When I create a sales lead appointment for a customer with values:
| cifKey | contactStaffID | interestedInProduct | noteText | scheduleDate | appointmentStartTime | appointmentEndTime |
| 0100000933079696000 | 83018 | Notaproduct | Another Appointment Test Note | next_week | 09.00 | 09.30 |

children.description: Create sales lead appointment: | cifKey | contactStaffID | interestedInProduct | noteText | scheduleDate | appointmentStartTime | appointmentEndTime | | 0100000933079696000 | 83018 | Notaproduct | Another Appointment Test Note | next_week | 09.00 | 09.30 |

testSteps.description: Then I should receive a Validation Error

userStory.storyName: Create Sales Lead Appointment for customer

title: Try to create a Sales Lead Appointment with an invalid interestedInProduct Value
